thread.section_title: Amba Hotel Charing Cross - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hotel and location
thread.title_full: Great hotel and location - Review of Amba Hotel Charing Cross, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: fatboyuk
title: Great hotel and location
text:
This is fast becoming my favourite hotel in London, it is so close to where you'd want to be for a great weekend away.
Staff are so friendly, a smile and kind word always gets a response. Rooms are well appointed and although the rooms at the front can be a little noisy they are very nice.
Complimentary water, biscuits and chocolate in the mini bar is a nice touch.
Nice breakfast, ask for a table at the front overlooking the Strand.
Already saving for our next trip.
